name: Gesundi (strandgear)
description:
It was supposed to be a jam game but it's  a 3 months developed game :) 

Topic was "Let there be Chaos"  

Main hero has a party at his home and parents asked him for help. He needs to keep the house tidy, but he can't handle so many annoying little cousins and needs to vibe along with music... which is also sometimes turned off by little stup.. kids.

Hero also likes singing some nice lyrics from time to time.

Don't forget to water flowers, otherwise points will decrease  faster!
